response.overview: After their production "Princess Ida" meets with less-than-stunning reviews, the relationship between Gilbert and Sullivan is strained to breaking. Their friends and associates attempt to get the two to work together again, which opens the way to "The Mikado," one of the duo's greatest successes.
response.title: Topsy-Turvy

results.name: Mike Leigh on the Making of Topsy Turvy and Its Commercial Success
Three Reasons: Topsy-Turvy - The Criterion Collection
